title: 196 - Jesus is Both Inclusive and Exclusive
description:
Our friend Bonnie Lewis co-hosts this episode and we have a great discussion on what it means that Jesus is both inclusive and exclusive. What does that mean for us as followers? What does it mean for the world? As always, thanks for listening! 
 
Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
